name: fortinet-fortiweb-cloud
label: Fortinet FortiWeb Cloud
description: FortiWeb Cloud is an cloud native SaaS based web application firewall (WAF) that protects web applications.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: Specify the URL of the FortiWeb Cloud server to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: server_url
fields.tooltip: Specify the URL of the FortiWeb Cloud server to connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: API Key
fields.description: Specify the API key to access the endpoint to which you will connect and perform the automated operations
fields.name: api_key
fields.tooltip: Specify the API key to access the endpoint to which you will connect and perform the automated operations

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is set to True.
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is set to True.

operations.title: Get Incident Dashboard Details
operations.description: Retrieves information for the global setting configurations from FortiWeb Cloud based on the widget name and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Widget Name
parameters.description: Select the name of the widget based on which you want to filter the incident dashboard retrieved from FortiWeb Cloud. You can choose from the following options: Threats Timeline, Incidents Timeline, Country, Attack Type, High Risk, or Http Host.
parameters.tooltip: Select the name of the widget based on which you want to filter the incident dashboard retrieved from FortiWeb Cloud. You can choose from the following options: Threats Timeline, Incidents Timeline, Country, Attack Type, High Risk, or Http Host.
parameters.name: widget_id

parameters.title: Action Name
parameters.description: Select the name of the action based on which you want to filter the incident dashboard retrieved from FortiWeb Cloud. You can choose from the following options: All, Block, or Monitor.
parameters.tooltip: Select the name of the action based on which you want to filter the incident dashboard retrieved from FortiWeb Cloud. You can choose from the following options: All, Block, or Monitor.
parameters.name: action

parameters.title: Host Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the host based on which you want to retrieve information from FortiWeb Cloud.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the host based on which you want to retrieve information from FortiWeb Cloud.
parameters.name: host

parameters.title: Time Range
parameters.description: Specify the time range when the incident were created in FortiWeb Cloud, and from when you want to retrieve incident dashboard details from FortiWeb Cloud. For e.g 24h, 7d, etc.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the time range when the incidents were created in FortiWeb Cloud, and from when you want to retrieve incident dashboard details from FortiWeb Cloud. For e.g 24h, 7d, etc.
parameters.name: time_range

operations.title: Get Incident List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all incidents from FortiWeb Cloud based on the time range and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Time Range
parameters.description: Specify the time range when the incidents were created in FortiWeb Cloud, and from when you want to retrieve incidents from FortiWeb Cloud. For e.g 24h, 7d, etc.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the time range when the incidents were created in FortiWeb Cloud, and from when you want to retrieve incidents from FortiWeb Cloud. For e.g 24h, 7d, etc.
parameters.name: time_range

parameters.title: Filter
parameters.description: Specify multiple key/value pairs in json format used to filter incidents retrieved from the FortiWeb Cloud.
parameters.tooltip: Specify multiple key/value pairs in json format used to filter incidents retrieved from the FortiWeb Cloud.
parameters.name: filter

parameters.title: Page Size
parameters.description: Specify the number of results, per page, that you want to include in the response of this operation.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the number of results, per page, that you want to include in the response of this operation.
parameters.name: size

parameters.title: Page Number
parameters.description: Specify the page number from which you want to fetch incident from FortiWeb Cloud.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page number from which you want to fetch incident from FortiWeb Cloud.
parameters.name: page

operations.title: Get Incident Details
operations.description: Retrieves information for a specific incident from FortiWeb Cloud based on the incident ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Incident ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the incident based on which you want to retrieve information from FortiWeb Cloud.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the incident based on which you want to retrieve information from FortiWeb Cloud.
parameters.name: incident_id

operations.title: Get Incident Timeline Details
operations.description: Retrieves information for a specific incident timeline from FortiWeb Cloud based on the incident ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Incident ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the incident based on which you want to retrieve information from FortiWeb Cloud.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the incident based on which you want to retrieve information from FortiWeb Cloud.
parameters.name: incident_id

operations.title: Get Insight Events Summary
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all insight events summary from FortiWeb Cloud.

operations.title: Get Incident Aggregated Details
operations.description: Retrieves information for a specific incident aggregated from FortiWeb Cloud based on the incident ID and group by parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Incident ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the incident based on which you want to retrieve information from FortiWeb Cloud.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the incident based on which you want to retrieve information from FortiWeb Cloud.
parameters.name: incident_id

parameters.title: Group By
parameters.description: Select the group by based on which you want to filter the incident aggregated retrieved from FortiWeb Cloud, Use "Logs" to get view sample attack logs of a specific incident. You can choose from the following options: Logs, Attack Type, Source Country, HTTP Host, HTTP URL, Source IP, Signature CVE ID, or OWASP TOP10.
parameters.tooltip: Select the group by based on which you want to filter the incident aggregated retrieved from FortiWeb Cloud, Use "Logs" to get view sample attack logs of a specific incident. You can choose from the following options: Logs, Attack Type, Source Country, HTTP Host, HTTP URL, Source IP, Signature CVE ID, or OWASP TOP10.
parameters.name: name

operations.title: Get Insight Events
operations.description: Retrieves information for a insight events by event type from FortiWeb Cloud based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Event Type
parameters.description: Select the type of the event based on which you want to filter the insight events retrieved from FortiWeb Cloud. You can choose from the following options: Exposed Server, Trust IP, Unprotected Host, Monitor Service, or WAF Config Alarm.
parameters.tooltip: Select the type of the event based on which you want to filter the insight events retrieved from FortiWeb Cloud. You can choose from the following options: Exposed Server, Trust IP, Unprotected Host, Monitor Service, or WAF Config Alarm.
parameters.name: type

parameters.title: Cursor
parameters.description: To list the items of the first page, leave the cursor value empty. To go forward to next page, get the value of the "next_cursor" parameter in the result of the current page, then paste it here as the cursor value. To go to the previous page, get the "prev_cursor" value, then paste it here as the cursor value.
parameters.tooltip: To list the items of the first page, leave the cursor value empty. To go forward to next page, get the value of the "next_cursor" parameter in the result of the current page, then paste it here as the cursor value. To go to the previous page, get the "prev_cursor" value, then paste it here as the cursor value.
parameters.name: cursor

parameters.title: Page Size
parameters.description: Specify the number of results, per page, that you want to include in the response of this operation. The value shall be 10, 20, 30.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the number of results, per page, that you want to include in the response of this operation. The value shall be 10, 20, 30.
parameters.name: size

parameters.title: Forward
parameters.description: If you select this option it will fetch next page records, otherwise it will fetch previous page records.
parameters.tooltip: If you select this option it will fetch next page records, otherwise it will fetch previous page records.
parameters.name: forward
